snippet.title: A Flower from Hermes - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
PLAY FOR FREE: https://3hg.itch.io/a-flower-from-hermes

They survived the Trojan War, the Cyclopes, the Man-Eating Giants, but trapped on an unknown island without food, can they survive each other? Help Odysseus and three high-maintenance crewmates overcome hunger and ego in this short RPG adventure. Grab your bronze weapons and clash against daemons in the crew's most dangerous journey yet.

Facebook: https://facebook.com/3HalvesGames/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/3HalvesGames/
itchio: https://3hg.itch.io/
